name: Sushi Pop for Kakao
description:
Absolutely yummirific Game! Fun and Delicious looking game Sushi Pop for Kakao has been launched!
Exciting music! Become the best Sushi Pop with various cute chefs!

This game is very addictive and simple puzzle game!

◆ Launching event ◆
- Log-in Everyday for infinite rewards!
- Invite your friends! Add your fun and get more rewards!

◆ Game Description ◆
Sushi Pop is a very addictive and simple puzzle game.
Simply connect the matching sushi. You may connect vertically, horizontally, and even diagonally.
Fun Fevertime! Delicious cake Combotime! and Finish with Bonustime!
With various chefs of different skills and power-up items have a great rank competition between friends!

◆ Variety of Game Modes! ◆
Make first place in the ranking competition between friends!
Score battle with your friend by one-on-one match!

** If there are any questions about game please ask via "Game" -> "Option" -> "Q&A" button **
[Homepage] http://selvas.com
[Facebook] http://facebook.com/selvastoko
